document.masterDocTitle: New species and records of Ischnosoma Stephens (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Tachyporinae) from Nepal

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 45. Distribution of
Ischnosoma quadriguttatum quadriguttatum (Champion)
in Nepal (material examined and literature records).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks.
I. quadriguttatum quadriguttatum
is widespread in Southeast Asia. In Nepal , it is the most common species and present everywhere ( Fig. 45 ). A second subspecies,
I. quadriguttatum japonicum Kocian, 2003
was described from Japan .
